text: Swindle is a 2013 American television movie starring Noah Crawford, Chris O'Neal, Jennette McCurdy, Noah Munck, Ariana Grande, Ciara Bravo, and Fred Ewanuick. Based on Gordon Korman's novel of the same name, the movie tells the story of Griffin (Noah Crawford), a boy who retrieves his friend's valuable baseball card from an unscrupulous collectibles dealer with the help of his friends. The movie premiered August 24, 2013 to an audience of over 4.2 million viewers. The movie was released on DVD on March 19, 2014, and on Blu- ray on December 4, 2015. ==Reception== Common Sense Media gave the movie a rating of 4 out of 5 stars. ==References== Category:2013 movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American television movies Category:English-language movies Category:Nickelodeon Category:Teen movies
title: Swindle
